title: my first montage

embed.description: League of Legends Montage: Best play highlights ►Make sure to leave a "LIKE" if you enjoyed the Video (*^ -^*) ➥ Send me your plays, outplays or fails → lolreplays@hy-vive.de --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Hier ist mein Erstes, best play´s Montage. Bin über jede Kritik dankbar! Teilt mir mit, was Euch nicht gefallen hat!

body:
Hey guys  check out my first League Montage,
 it was a hard Piece of work
so give me some Feedback if u like 

Have a nice day and thank you  :D

replies.body: Nice montage, just wondering what program did you use?
Hey, thank you alod! I used Adobe Premiere Pro CC 2017 ^^

Great montage, Might just recommend you use different music just a tip.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
